title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search
name: New Tiddler from Search
author: Mario Pietsch
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/core/ui/DefaultSearchResultList": { "title": "$:/core/ui/DefaultSearchResultList", "tags": "$:/tags/SearchResults", "caption": "{{$:/language/Search/DefaultResults/Caption}}", "first-search-filter": "[!is[system]search:titlesort[title]limit[250]]", "second-search-filter": "[!is[system]searchsort[title]limit[250]]", "text": "\define searchResultList() //{{$:/language/Search/Matches/Title}}// <$list filter="[minlength[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$list filter={{{ [get[first-search-filter]] }}} emptyMessage={{$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search/template}}> addsuffix[-primaryList]] -[get[text]] +[then[]else[tc-list-item-selected]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> //{{$:/language/Search/Matches/All}}// <$list filter="[minlength[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$list filter={{{ [get[second-search-filter]] }}}> addsuffix[-secondaryList]] -[get[text]] +[then[]else[tc-list-item-selected]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> \end <> " }, "$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search/styles": { "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search/styles", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "text": " .wikilabs-full-width{ width: 100%; } " }, "$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search/template": { "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search/template", "text": "\define createTiddler() <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$(searchTiddler)$!!text}} tags= {{$(new-tiddler-temp)$!!tags}} text= {{$(new-tiddler-temp)$}} /> \end \define new-tiddler-temp() $:/temp/new-tiddler-from-search \end \define new-tiddler-from-search-template() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Clear/Caption}} > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/cancel-button" /> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/NewTiddler/Caption}} actions=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/done-button" /> : <$transclude tiddler="$(searchTiddler)$" />

<$edit-text field="tags" class="wikilabs-full-width" tiddler=<> placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Tags/Add/Placeholder}} />
<$edit-text field="text" class="wikilabs-full-width" tiddler=<> placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Body/Placeholder}} default=""/>

\end <>" }, "$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search/history": { "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search/history", "text": "V 1.0.1 - 2020-12-25 * update license V 1.0.0 - 2020.12.08 * Make it compatible to TW V5.1.23 V 0.1.2 - 2020.01.19 * Update license link/text V 0.1.1 - 2016 * initial release " }, "$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search/license": { "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search/license", "text": "[[New-Tiddler-From-Search-Plugin|https://wikilabs.github.io/#new-tiddler-from-search]] (c) Mario Pietsch - 2016-2021 https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause " }, "$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search/readme", "text": "This plugin provides a minimal "new Tiddler" interface, if a search doesn't return any results. There are 2 buttons. * {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}} .. Clear the temporary template tiddler * {{$:/core/images/done-button}} .. Save the tiddler ''Important'': This plugin overwrites core template tiddlers: * $:/core/ui/DefaultSearchResultList " } } }
